qas.question: What are the three largest sports clubs by popularity in Portugal?

answers.text: SL Benfica, FC Porto, and Sporting CP

qas.question: What are the three largest sports club by popularity in Portugal known as?
How many titles in the European UEFA club competitions have "the big three" won?
Other than football, what other sports are popular in Portugal?

answers.text: roller hockey, basketball, futsal, handball, and volleyball

qas.question: By what entity is the Algarve Cup hosted?

answers.text: Portuguese Football Federation (FPF)  – Federação Portuguesa de Futebol

context: <a0_0>SL Benfica, FC Porto, and Sporting CP<a0_0/> are the largest sports clubs by popularity and by number of trophies won, often known as <a1_0>"os três grandes" ("the big three")<a1_0/>. They have won <a2_0>eight<a2_0/> titles in the European UEFA club competitions, were present in many finals and have been regular contenders in the last stages almost every season. Other than football, many Portuguese sports clubs, including the "big three", compete in several other sports events with a varying level of success and popularity, these may include <a3_0>roller hockey, basketball, futsal, handball, and volleyball<a3_0/>. The <a4_0>Portuguese Football Federation (FPF)  – Federação Portuguesa de Futebol<a4_0/> – annually hosts the Algarve Cup, a prestigious women`s football tournament that has been celebrated in the Algarvian part of Portugal.
